meanings.definition: The act of creating a design by cutting holes in a material and then applying paint or ink through the holes onto a surface.
meanings.sent1: Stencilling involves cutting holes in a material to make a design.
meanings.sent2: I learned stencilling in art class last week.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried stencilling its pawprints on the wet cement.
meanings.sent4: Her stencilling of stars on the ceiling made it feel like a night sky.
meanings.sent5: The stencilling on the wall looked like intricate lacework.

meanings.definition: A design created using a stencil.
meanings.sent1: The stencilling on the pillow was a beautiful floral pattern.
meanings.sent2: She admired the stencilling on the window glass.
meanings.sent3: The stencilling on the cake made it look too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: The stencilling of hearts on the card was a lovely touch.
meanings.sent5: The stencilling on the invitation matched the wedding theme perfectly.

meanings.definition: To create a design using a stencil.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys stencilling patterns on fabric for her crafts.
meanings.sent2: I will be stencilling the logo on the banner for the event.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally stencilled his hand on the wall while painting.
meanings.sent4: The artist stencilled a forest scene on the canvas.
meanings.sent5: Stencilling the border of the room added a touch of elegance.
